data.introduce: 该接口功能对应黑屏指令是NFD，可用于查询指定航线与日期上特定航空公司所发布的净价信息。支持指定城市对/日期/航司查询，也可增加查询条件（舱位/运价基础/大客户编码/航程种类等）更快更精准地获取运价结果。
data.business: 该接口功能对应黑屏指令是NFD，可用于查询指定航线与日期上特定航空公司所发布的净价信息。支持指定城市对/日期/航司查询，也可增加查询条件（舱位/运价基础/大客户编码/航程种类等）更快更精准地获取运价结果。
data.functions:
该接口功能对应黑屏指令是 NFD，可用于查询指定航线与日期上特定航空公
司所发布的净价信息。支持指定城市对/日期/航司查询，也可增加查询条件（舱
位/运价基础/大客户编码/航程种类等）更快更精准地获取运价结果。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"fareDisplay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价查询接口","children":[{"name":"domesticFareDisplay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内运价查询","children":[{"name":"request","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求","children":[{"name":"seller","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"身份信息","children":[{"name":"sysCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"系统,ICS-B系统,CRS-C系统","children":[]},{"name":"channel","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"渠道：1E-主机；XXET-B2B、B2C渠道","children":[]},{"name":"travelAgencyCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OFFICE号,字母需大写","children":[]},{"name":"pid","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PID号,可以为字母","children":[]},{"name":"pos","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售地/营业部/location，字母需大写","children":[]}]},{"name":"od","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OD信息","children":[{"name":"origin","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价始发地","children":[{"name":"code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地点三字码，字母需大写","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"地点三字码类型,AIRPORT-机场,CITY-城市","children":[]}]},{"name":"destination","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价目的地","children":[{"name":"code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地点三字码，字母需大写","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"地点三字码类型,AIRPORT-机场,CITY-城市","children":[]}]},{"name":"connectionLocationMaxNum","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最大中转点数量限制,无此字段表示不限制","children":[]},{"name":"connectionLocations","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"中转点","children":[{"name":"connectionLocation","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"中转点信息属性","children":[{"name":"locationCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"中转点三字码,字母需大写","children":[]},{"name":"locationType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"中转点三字码类型,AIRPORT-机场,CITY-城市","children":[]},{"name":"@seq","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按数字顺序从小至大，表达顺序","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时间","children":[{"name":"travelTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅行日期","children":[{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"YYYY-MM-DD","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"HH:MM:SS","children":[]}]},{"name":"saleTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"销售日期","children":[{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"YYYY-MM-DD","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"HH:MM:SS","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"preferences","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询偏好","children":[{"name":"requestType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求类型","children":[{"name":"fareTypeCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价类型,PUB-公布价查询,PRI-私有价查询","children":[]},{"name":"fareTypeSubCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求类型,FD-公布价查询,NFD-私有价查询,NFQ-按routing的私有价查询","children":[]}]},{"name":"carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价航司（目前必填）","children":[]},{"name":"rbds","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[{"name":"rbd","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位信息","children":[{"name":"rbdCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"rbdSubCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"fbc","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础","children":[]},{"name":"accountCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[]},{"name":"ptcs","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客类型限制(折扣代码限制)","children":[{"name":"ptc","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"cabin","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[]},{"name":"journeyType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航程种类","children":[]},{"name":"aircraftTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型代码","children":[]},{"name":"order","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"LOW_TO_HIGH","description":"排序方式， FD默认HIGH_TO_LOW，NFD默认LOW_TO_HIGH LOW_TO_HIGH-(L)低至高 HIGH_TO_LOW-(H)高至低","children":[]},{"name":"includeInformations","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"输出信息包含内容，目前支持FARE、YQ、CN、TPM（里程信息）","children":[{"name":"includeInformation","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"FARE","description":"输出信息内容,FARE-运价信息,BRAND-品牌信息,TPM-航距信息,YQ-YQ税（YQ独立接口）,CN-CN税（和equipmentType配合使用）","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"response","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结果部分","children":[{"name":"offers","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结果offer（结果解析入口）","children":[{"name":"offer","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"offerID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"offer主键","children":[]},{"name":"carrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司两字码","children":[]},{"name":"fareID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"fare主键","children":[]},{"name":"routingID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"routing主键","children":[]},{"name":"endorsementID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"endorsement主键","children":[]},{"name":"brandID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"brand主键","children":[]},{"name":"rule","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则信息，作为查规则接口的入参","children":[{"name":"ruleVersion","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"规则版本,V1-旧规则,V2-新规则","children":[]},{"name":"ruleID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"rule主键","children":[]}]},{"name":"travelTimeRanges","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"travelTimeRange","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅行时间范围","children":[{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅行时间范围类型","children":[]},{"name":"timeID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"time主键","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"ticketTimeRanges","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ticketTimeRange","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"运价允许出票时间范围","children":[{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价允许出票时间范围类型","children":[]},{"name":"timeID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"time主键","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"farePrices","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价价格信息","children":[{"name":"farePrice","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价价格信息","children":[{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价类型,OW-OW运价,RT-RT运价","children":[]},{"name":"priceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"price主键","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税费信息","children":[{"name":"tax","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"taxID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"tax主键","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@seq","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按数字顺序从小至大，表达顺序","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"dataLibrary","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结果元数据","children":[{"name":"fares","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"fare元数据","children":[{"name":"fare","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"fare元数据","children":[{"name":"location","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价location","children":[]},{"name":"origin","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价始发地","children":[{"name":"airport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价始发地机场代码","children":[]},{"name":"city","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价始发地城市代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"destination","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价目的地","children":[{"name":"airport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价目的地机场代码","children":[]},{"name":"city","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价目的地城市代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"fbc","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"fareType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价属性","children":[{"name":"typeCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价类型,PUB-公布价,PRI-私有价","children":[]},{"name":"subCode","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价子类型,FBR-FBR运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"rbd","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"rbd舱位信息","children":[{"name":"rbdCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"rbdSubCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"cabin","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[]},{"name":"normalFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"正常运价(FD)信息","children":[{"name":"pnTravelType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"正常(FD)运价类型-PN,OW-仅单程,RT-仅往返,BOTH-单程和往返","children":[]},{"name":"pnFarePriceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"price主键","children":[]}]},{"name":"specialFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"特种运价(FD)信息","children":[{"name":"specialFareSource","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"特种运价来源,DISCOUNT-基于正常运价的折扣计算得出,AMOUNT-直接基于金额类特种运价","children":[]},{"name":"psTravelType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"特种(FD)运价类型-PS,OW-仅单程,RT-仅往返,BOTH-单程和往返","children":[]},{"name":"psFarePriceID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"price主键","children":[]},{"name":"discper","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"特种运价比正常运价的折扣比例,如80%","children":[]}]},{"name":"tourCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅行编码","children":[]},{"name":"ptc","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型,AD-成人,CH-儿童,IN-婴儿","children":[]},{"name":"stay","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"停留时长限制（fare内）","children":[{"name":"minStay","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最短停留时间","children":[]},{"name":"minStayUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"最短停留时间单位","children":[]},{"name":"maxStay","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最长停留时间","children":[]},{"name":"maxStayUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"最长停留时间单位","children":[]}]},{"name":"fareFileInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价文件信息","children":[{"name":"fareFileNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价文件/协议编号","children":[]},{"name":"fareFileSubNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价文件/协议子编号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@fareID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"表达被offer所引用的关系","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"tax元数据","children":[{"name":"tax","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"tax元数据","children":[{"name":"taxID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"tax主键","children":[]},{"name":"taxCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"tax代码,YQ-燃油附加收取标准,CN-民航发展基金","children":[]},{"name":"owner","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数据发布者,航司两字码-对应航司发布,CHINESE_GOVERNMENT-中国政府发布,SYSTEM_DEFAULT-系统默认值","children":[]},{"name":"taxFlag","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"tax标记,CHARGE-需缴纳,FREE-免税，税费被豁免,UNKNOW-未知情况（如无法获取航距的场景）","children":[]},{"name":"taxPriceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"price主键","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"prices","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"price元数据","children":[{"name":"price","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"price元数据","children":[{"name":"priceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"price主键","children":[]},{"name":"amount","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"价格金额数据","children":[]},{"name":"currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"价格货币类型,CNY-人民币","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"times","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"time元数据","children":[{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"标准时间属性（含ID）","children":[{"name":"timeID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"time主键","children":[]},{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"YYYY-MM-DD","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"HH:MM:SS","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"routings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"routing元数据","children":[{"name":"routing","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"routing元数据","children":[{"name":"routingID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"routing主键","children":[]},{"name":"routingDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"routingDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"routing详情","children":[{"name":"segAirportFrom","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段始发地","children":[]},{"name":"segAirportTo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段目的地","children":[]},{"name":"stay","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"停留时间限制","children":[{"name":"stayType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"停留类型,X-Tansfer转机（24小时以内，含24小时）,S-Stopover经停（24小时以上）,O-Other自定义","children":[]},{"name":"minStay","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最小停留时间","children":[{"name":"value","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"unit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"maxStay","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最大停留时间","children":[{"name":"value","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"unit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"carrierDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"carrierDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运人详情","children":[{"name":"operatingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"承运航司","children":[]},{"name":"rbdDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"rbdDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"rbd详情","children":[{"name":"rbd","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"rbd舱位信息","children":[{"name":"rbdCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"rbdSubCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"farebasis","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@no","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按数字顺序从小至大，表达顺序","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"flightNoRange","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航班号范围","children":[{"name":"allowedFrom","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"允许起始航班号","children":[]},{"name":"allowedTo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"允许截止航班号","children":[]},{"name":"forbiddenFrom","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"例外起始航 FFERED-(N)不提供","children":[]},{"name":"serviceType","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"服务属性","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"tpms","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"TPM元数据","children":[{"name":"tpm","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"TPM元数据","children":[{"name":"tpmID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"TPM主键","children":[]},{"name":"origin","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地点信息属性","children":[{"name":"code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地点三字码，字母需大写","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"地点三字码类型,AIRPORT-机场,CITY-城市","children":[]}]},{"name":"destination","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地点信息属性","children":[{"name":"code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地点三字码，字母需大写","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"地点三字码类型,AIRPORT-机场,CITY-城市","children":[]}]},{"name":"distance","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"距离","children":[]},{"name":"unit","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"距离单位，固定为km","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"tpmID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"TPM主键","children":[]},{"name":"saleTimeID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"time主键","children":[]},{"name":"systemInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信息","children":[{"name":"systemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信息类型,ERROR-错误,WARNING-警告","children":[]},{"name":"code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码/警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误内容/警告内容","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"otherInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"其他信息","children":[{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"耗时信息","children":[{"name":"elapseTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"耗时","children":[]},{"name":"unit","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"耗时单位（固定为ms）","children":[]}]},{"name":"requestTimeStamp","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时间戳","children":[{"name":"requestTimeStampTest","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"调用时间戳（文本格式）","children":[]},{"name":"requestTimeStamp","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标准时间属性","children":[{"name":"date","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"YYYY-MM-DD","children":[]},{"name":"time","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"HH:MM:SS","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"versions","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"版本信息","children":[{"name":"engineVersion","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"引擎版本,V2-DPRIC
